import React from 'react'; import { FaIndustry, FaThermometerHalf, FaTint, FaCogs } from 'react-icons/fa'; const DistillationPage = () => { const distillationTypes = [ { icon: , title: "Packed Columns", description: "High efficiency separation with structured or random packing for enhanced mass transfer." }, { icon: , title: "Tray Columns", description: "Traditional design with multiple stages for reliable separation performance." }, { icon: , title: "Specialty Columns", description: "Custom-designed systems for unique separation challenges and specific applications." } ]; return (
{/* Page Header */}

Distillation Column Design & Engineering

Advanced distillation column design and optimization for New Zealand's chemical and food processing industries, delivering efficient separation solutions that maximize product purity while minimizing energy consumption and environmental impact.

{/* Distillation Overview */}

Precision Separation Technology

Distillation columns are fundamental separation units in chemical processing, utilizing differences in boiling points to purify and separate valuable products. Our expertise ensures optimal design for maximum efficiency and product quality.

From petrochemical refining to food-grade alcohol production, we provide comprehensive distillation solutions tailored to New Zealand's diverse industrial requirements and sustainability goals.

Design Optimization

  • • Thermodynamic modeling and simulation
  • • Energy integration and heat recovery
  • • Column internals selection
  • • Process control system design
  • • Environmental impact assessment
  • • Economic optimization
{/* Column Types */}

Column Types & Configurations

Tailored distillation solutions for diverse separation requirements

{distillationTypes.map((type, index) => (
{type.icon}

{type.title}

{type.description}

))}
{/* Applications */}

Industry Applications

Chemical Processing

High-purity separation for pharmaceutical, petrochemical, and specialty chemical production.

  • • Solvent recovery
  • • Product purification
  • • Waste stream treatment
  • • Catalyst regeneration

Food & Beverage

Food-grade distillation for alcohol, essential oils, and flavor compound production.

  • • Ethanol production
  • • Essential oil extraction
  • • Flavor concentration
  • • Water purification
{/* Energy Efficiency */}

Energy Efficiency Focus

Our distillation designs prioritize energy efficiency through heat integration, optimal reflux ratios, and advanced control systems, reducing operational costs and environmental impact.

); }; export default DistillationPage;
